short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will search titles on a Gobi page and display the number of matches found in Duke University Libraries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will search titles of the Duke University's library catalog and display matches on a Gobi page. 

Version 2.4 Updated the search URL according to the catalog's search syntax changes
Version 2.3 a) Removed the double quotations surrounding a book title (exact phrase searching) to avoid false negative results due to possible typos in the original text. b) Added a regular expression to accommodate multiple linky running and changing the text display. c) Hyperlinked to the library catalog when the extension didn't find any matching title. 
Version 2.2 Package update
Version 2.1 Updated to meet the Manifest Version 3
Version 1.1 Update the search string, search by "main title"
Version 1.0 Updated the new catalog URL
Version 0.2 Fixed the stalling problem on the second and subsequent pages at the Gobi site.
